key.name: prefer-dark-theme
key.description: Use the dark variant of the GTK theme, if available.

key.name: game-path
key.description: If the path is relative, it will be appended to the user's home directory.

key.name: force-windowed
key.description: This overrides the in-game setting for windowed or fullscreen mode.

key.name: show-world
key.summary: Show world in the background of the main menu
key.description:
When enabled, the main menu has the default terrain visible in the background.
Disable for faster startup times.

key.name: show-script-errors
key.description: NOTE: In the Eden Editor, script errors are always shown, even if this is disabled.

key.name: file-patching
key.summary: Allow game to load unpacked data
key.description: Modifications do not need to be packed into a PBO file. Recommended only for development purposes.
